memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< T > XModel)
memberdef.name: AdaptCriteria

briefdescription.para: Selects and applies the adaptation criteria for mesh refinement/coarsening.

detaileddescription.para:
T
Data type
XParam
Model parameters
XForcing
Forcing data
XModel
Model structure
Success flag (0 or 1)
This function chooses the adaptation method ("Threshold", "Inrange", "Targetlevel") based on XParam.AdaptCrit, and applies it to the mesh using the corresponding criteria function. It sets the refine/coarsen flags for each block according to the selected method and arguments. For "Targetlevel", it loops over all target adaptation maps.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< float > XModel)
memberdef.name: AdaptCriteria< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Forcing< float > XForcing, Model< double > XModel)
memberdef.name: AdaptCriteria< double >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, T threshold, T *z, BlockP< T > XBlock, bool *refine, bool *coarsen)
memberdef.name: Thresholdcriteria

briefdescription.para: Applies threshold-based adaptation criteria for mesh refinement/coarsening.

detaileddescription.para:
T
Data type
XParam
Model parameters
threshold
Threshold value for adaptation
z
Array of variable values (e.g., water depth)
XBlock
Block data structure
refine
Array of refinement flags
coarsen
Array of coarsening flags
Success flag (0 or 1)
Refines blocks where any cell value exceeds the threshold, coarsens otherwise.

Threshold criteria is a general form of wet dry criteria. Simple wet/dry refining criteria. If the block is wet -> refine is true. If the block is dry -> coarsen is true.
the refinement sanity check is meant to be done after running this function.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, float threshold, float *z, BlockP< float > XBlock, bool *refine, bool *coarsen)
memberdef.name: Thresholdcriteria< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, double threshold, double *z, BlockP< double > XBlock, bool *refine, bool *coarsen)
memberdef.name: Thresholdcriteria< double >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, T zmin, T zmax, T *z, BlockP< T > XBlock, bool *refine, bool *coarsen)
memberdef.name: inrangecriteria

briefdescription.para: Applies in-range adaptation criteria for mesh refinement/coarsening.

detaileddescription.para:
T
Data type
XParam
Model parameters
zmin
Minimum value for refinement
zmax
Maximum value for refinement
z
Array of variable values
XBlock
Block data structure
refine
Array of refinement flags
coarsen
Array of coarsening flags
Success flag (0 or 1)
Refines blocks where any cell value is within [zmin, zmax], coarsens otherwise.

Simple in-range refining criteria. If any value of z (could be any variable) is zmin <= z <= zmax the block will try to refine. Otherwise, the block will try to coarsen.
the refinement sanity check is meant to be done after running this function.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, float zmin, float zmax, float *z, BlockP< float > XBlock, bool *refine, bool *coarsen)
memberdef.name: inrangecriteria< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, double zmin, double zmax, double *z, BlockP< double > XBlock, bool *refine, bool *coarsen)
memberdef.name: inrangecriteria< double >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, StaticForcingP< int > targetlevelmap, BlockP< T > XBlock, bool *refine, bool *coarsen)
memberdef.name: targetlevelcriteria

briefdescription.para: Applies target level adaptation criteria for mesh refinement/coarsening.

detaileddescription.para:
T
Data type
XParam
Model parameters
targetlevelmap
Map of target levels for adaptation
XBlock
Block data structure
refine
Array of refinement flags
coarsen
Array of coarsening flags
Success flag (0 or 1)
Refines blocks where target level is greater than current, coarsens if equal or lower.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, StaticForcingP< int > targetlevelmap, BlockP< float > XBlock, bool *refine, bool *coarsen)
memberdef.name: targetlevelcriteria< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, StaticForcingP< int > targetlevelmap, BlockP< double > XBlock, bool *refine, bool *coarsen)
memberdef.name: targetlevelcriteria< double >
